title: I got 1st prize for science exhibition in class 11 and 12, is it of any use if I want to get admission in any good colleges given that I scored less in 12th boards? - Quora

response.answer_text: it totally depends on you and on your project if it is a top-notch project which can be used in future technologies or it is your own idea which you have applied on your project then you can forward it further for more research which will include scholarships for you my friend's brother was hired for google just bcoz of his international level project so the choice is yours its something kind of October sky movie hope it helps
